mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card (title, u_id, cl_id) VALUES(#{title}, #{u_id}, #{cl_id})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, cl.p_id, c.u_id, c.title, c.content, c.cdate, c.udate, c.cl_id, c.ps_id FROM card c INNER JOIN cardlist cl ON c.cl_id=cl.id WHERE c.id=#{c.id}
SELECT c.id, c.u_id, c.title, c.content, c.cdate, c.udate, c.ddate, c.cl_id, c.ps_id, cl.p_id FROM card c INNER JOIN cardlist cl ON c.cl_id=cl.id WHERE p_id=#{p_id} ORDER BY id;
SELECT c.id, cl.p_id, c.u_id, c.title, c.content, c.cdate, c.udate, c.cl_id, c.ps_id FROM card c INNER JOIN cardlist cl ON c.cl_id=cl.id WHERE c.id=#{id}
